mapper.select: SELECT t.dept_name, t2.servetime_name, COUNT(t1.id) as dinertotalnum , SUM(CASE WHEN t1.dinner_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS usedinernum, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.dinner_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unusedinernum FROM bc_dinerdept t LEFT JOIN bc_mealdetail t1 ON t.id = t1.dept_id LEFT JOIN bc_mealservetime t2 ON t1.food_grounding = t2.id AND t1.bc_time between #{begindate} and #{enddate} GROUP BY t.id, t2.id;
